issue.title: [CF 1399] Incorrect icon for spell cooldown (7.2)
issue.body:
Spells that are not talented seem to show up in spell cooldowns where they previously didn't.

 

On my elemental shaman, I have this being watched for a spell cooldown icon:

 

"Lightning Surge Totem; Earthgrab Totem; Earthbind Totem"

 

But when I'm not talented into LST, it always shows the LST icon (it used to properly fall back to the others in the list in 7.1.5).


> Posted by CurseForge user owiber | Imported from CurseForge issue #1399 | Raw

comments.body:
Hmmm, changing my talents and then switching back again seems to have fixed it.

Edited Apr 4, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user owiber

Blizzard broke this. Use separate icons for each ability, with a condition on each icon to check if the corresponding talent is learned. Then, combine the 3 together into a meta icon.

Edited Apr 30, 2017
